com.cyc.session

Class CycSessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.session.CycSessionManager

  • public class CycSessionManager
extends Object
    The CycSessionManager provides a singleton implementation of a SessionManager. Additionally, it provides several convenience methods to access it. The CycSessionManager searches for SessionManager services during class initialization. If it cannot find any, it will throw a CycSessionManager.CycSessionManagerInitializationError.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CycSessionManager.CycSessionManagerInitializationError
      Exception thrown if the CycSessionManager cannot find any SessionManager services during class initialization.

      Methods

      static CycSession getCurrentSession()
      Returns the CycSession currently assigned to this thread.
      static CycSessionConfiguration getEnvironmentConfiguration()
      Returns an EnvironmentConfiguration, drawn from the System properties.
      static CycSession getSession()
      Returns a CycSession object, creating one if necessary.
      protected static List<SessionManager> loadAllSessionManagers()
      Returns a list of all available SessionManager implementations, with the default SessionManagerImpl implementation as the last element.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static SessionManager get()
        Returns a singleton implementation of SessionManager.
        Returns:
        A singleton SessionManager instance

      • getCurrentSession

        public static CycSession getCurrentSession()
                                    throws SessionConfigurationException,
                                           SessionCommunicationException,
                                           SessionInitializationException
        Returns the CycSession currently assigned to this thread. If no CycSession object currently exists, one will be acquired via getSession() and assigned to the local thread.
        Returns:
        CycSession
        Throws:
        SessionConfigurationException - if the application is not sufficiently configured for the CycConfigurationManager to connect to a Cyc server.
        SessionCommunicationException - if the application encounters problems communicating with a Cyc server.
        SessionInitializationException - if the application encounters problems initializing the CycSession.

      • getSession

        public static CycSession getSession()
                             throws SessionConfigurationException,
                                    SessionCommunicationException,
                                    SessionInitializationException
        Returns a CycSession object, creating one if necessary. If no CycSession object currently exists, one will be created from a configuration drawn from getConfiguration().
        Returns:
        a new CycSession object
        Throws:
        SessionConfigurationException - if the application is not sufficiently configured for the CycSession to identify a Cyc server.
        SessionCommunicationException - if the application encounters problems communicating with a Cyc server.
        SessionInitializationException - if the application encounters problems initializing the CycSession.

      • getConfiguration

        public static CycSessionConfiguration getConfiguration()
                                                throws SessionConfigurationException
        Returns a CycSessionConfiguration, suitable for creating a new CycSession. The SessionManager will first retrieve an EnvironmentConfiguration based on the System properties, and then expanding any configuration directives it might contain; the result is returned by this method. The SessionManager may cache CycSessionConfigurations if it believes there is no possibility that they would have changed: for example, if the EnvironmentConfiguration directly specifies a CycServer address, and the relevant System properties have not changed.
        Returns:
        a new CycSessionConfiguration
        Throws:
        SessionConfigurationException

      • getEnvironmentConfiguration

        public static CycSessionConfiguration getEnvironmentConfiguration()
                                                           throws SessionConfigurationException
        Returns an EnvironmentConfiguration, drawn from the System properties.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        SessionConfigurationException

      • loadAllSessionManagers

        protected static List<SessionManager> loadAllSessionManagers()
                                                      throws SessionServiceException,
                                                             SessionConfigurationException
        Returns a list of all available SessionManager implementations, with the default SessionManagerImpl implementation as the last element.
        Returns:
        all session managers
        Throws:
        SessionServiceException
        SessionConfigurationException
